name: Meow Sushi Night
description:
Meow Sushi Night is a fast paced 2D run & jump platform game. You play as a cat, and you need to run and jump between the rooftops of a big city, collecting as much sushi as possible along the way.

FEATURES
* Fast-paced run & jump gameplay
* Original soundtrack
* 5 playable cats
* 15 Achievements (+4 secret ones!)
* Online leaderboards
* Small size and low system requirements
